description: Try our easy to follow 20-Minute Chicken & Vegetable Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Broccoli,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Sweet potato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: 20-Minute Chicken & Vegetable Rice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice chicken breasts into large strips. Heat 1tbs oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add chicken and garlic to pan and cook for 5 minutes, turn, then cook for a further 5 minutes or until cooked through. Remove from pan and transfer to a plate.
Meanwhile, steam corn cobbettes in microwave-safe bowl with a tbs of water in the bottom, for 4-5 minutes.
Cook rice as per packet instructions. Chop fresh parsley and place in a bowl with salad leaves. Dress with half the lemon juice, remaining olive oil and toss to combine.
Divide chicken and salad between four plates with vegetable rice. Dress with remaining lemon juice.
